summary: This document is a declaration by Sidney Dorsey, a custodian of records at T-Mobile US, Inc., certifying the authenticity of records related to a lawful request in the Epstein case. Dorsey affirms that the records are true and complete copies maintained by the company.

persons.name: Sidney Dorsey
persons.context: Sidney Dorsey is the custodian of records at T-Mobile US, Inc. and is providing a declaration regarding the authenticity of records related to the Epstein case.

keyFacts: Sidney Dorsey is employed by T-Mobile US, Inc. as a custodian of records.
The declaration certifies that the records are true and complete copies maintained by T-Mobile.
The records pertain to Case No. 3140320 in response to a lawful request.
Dorsey affirms the records were made at or near the time of the occurrences described.
The document is intended to satisfy specific rules of evidence.
